sentences.en: A hexagon is a six - sided figure.
sentences.cn: 六边形是有6个边的图形.

sentences.en: Accessories ( standard ): hexagon bar wrench, a point chisel.
sentences.cn: 配件 ( 常规 ): 内六角扳手, 一支尖凿.

sentences.en: Available with Round or Hexagon Thread sizes M 3 to M 8.
sentences.cn: 具有圆形和六角形两种,螺纹尺寸M3到M8.

sentences.en: Electron excitation temperature of hexagon pattern was calculated using intensity ratio method.
sentences.cn: 采用发射光谱强度比法,计算了放电丝呈六边形斑图时的电子激发温度.

sentences.en: He presses the bolt against a small hexagon tattooed on his forearm. The sizes match.
sentences.cn: 他将螺钉与他前臂的一个小六边形纹身比了比，尺寸是一样的。

sentences.en: Hexagon screws, stainless steel screw, pneumatic, hydraulic joints, pipe fittings.
sentences.cn: 内六角螺丝, 不锈钢螺丝, 气动, 液压接头, 管件.

sentences.en: Hexagon socket head cap screws with countersunk head screws like.
sentences.cn: 内六角圆柱头螺钉与沉头螺钉相似.

sentences.en: Knew the area of hexagon, can change cipher out A.
sentences.cn: 知道了正六边形的面积, 就可以换算出a了.

sentences.en: Perfect hexagon is the most compact grouping of wires.
sentences.cn: 精确的六角形是最密实的钢丝束.

sentences.en: The fountain is in the shape a hexagon.
The influence of wall charge on hexagon pattern forming process is also discussed.
sentences.cn: 还讨论了壁电荷在其形成过程中起到的作用.

sentences.en: There were a constant number of shelves per hexagon.
sentences.cn: 每个六边形都有数量恒定的书架.

sentences.en: V : Now, now. Do not disparage the noble hexagon.
sentences.cn: 现在, 来. 别轻视了华贵的六边形.

sentences.en: Various windows embellish the corridor, with the shape of square, circle, hexagon and octagon.
sentences.cn: 走廊的窗户形状各异，有方形，有圆形，有六角形，也有八角形。

sentences.en: Why are honeycomb cells in bee hives hexagon shaped?
sentences.cn: 为什么蜂箱里的蜂巢是六边形的 呢 ?
